footer.newsletterDescription: New collections previews, behind-the-scenes from the atelier, and stories from the House. Nothing more.
footer.newsletterDescriptionMobile: New collections previews, behind-the-scenes from the atelier, and stories from the House.
footer.subscribeSuccessDetail: You will receive our upcoming communications.
footer.brandDescription: Exceptional Parisian eyewear. Five millennial symbols, artisanal craftsmanship, limited editions of 300 pieces.
footer.brandDescriptionMobile: Exceptional Parisian eyewear. Artisanal craftsmanship, limited editions of 300 pieces.

megaMenu.versaillesDescription: Inspired by the opulence of the palace, each frame captures the essence of French luxury. 24-karat gold and exceptional artisanal finishes.
megaMenu.heritageDescription: Each frame perpetuates Parisian artisanal excellence. Timeless creations crafted in our workshops.
megaMenu.isisSubtitle: The Cobra. The Scarab. The Eye.
megaMenu.isisDescription: What has endured for 5,000 years is not worn by chance. A collection inspired by the eternal symbols of ancient Egypt.
megaMenu.histoireDescription: Five millennial symbols. Exceptional artisanal craftsmanship. Eyewear designed to last and be passed down.

seo.defaultDescription: Discover RENAISSANCE Paris luxury eyewear. French artisanal craftsmanship, noble materials and timeless design. Created in Paris with passion.
